The elastic at the ankle doesn’t cinch much. The ankle is almost as wide as the rest of the pant leg, which is not what I want in a jogger. I bought these on sale for about $24, but that’s about the same price I paid for a great pair of joggers elsewhere. These are cheap, overpriced pants.
